author: gregames
msg: use an inlined function to eliminate one copy of the xadd assembler code.
You need to specify at least -O1 to enable inlining.  That seems fair.

author: jorton
msg: * testatomic.c: Whitelist rather than blacklist to enable
pthread_setconcurrency (fix build on a bunch of platforms
which don't have pthread_setconcurrency at all).

author: jorton
msg: * apr_atomic.c: abort() if any mutex locking or unlocking calls fail.

author: trawick
msg: axe apr_sockaddr_port_set() and apr_sockaddr_port_get() from APR

author: gregames
msg: be sure that _add and _inc use 32 bit instructions.  Also make sure gcc
knows we want the same register for an input and an output operand.
